title: Enterprise in Nigeria
creator_credit: Sydney Latter, Gerard Holdsworth and Unilever Films
brief_description: Nigeria, formerly an agricultural country, has a growing range of new industries giving Africans new opportunities and training facilities. With independence the process of industrialisation has accelerated. Shows how the United Africa Company, contributing capital and techniques in many different fields, is playing a part in the rapid development of the country. Traces the growth of industry in all three regions of Nigeria.
